name: js-client-sdk-repo-manager
description: Paper.xyz js sdk for Checkout Elements

scripts.patch: cd ./dist && npm version patch && cp package.json ../release-package.json && cd ../
scripts.minor: cd ./dist && npm version minor && cp package.json ../release-package.json && cd ../
scripts.major: cd ./dist && npm version major && cp package.json ../release-package.json && cd ../
scripts.release: npm run build && cp release-package.json ./dist/package.json && cd ./dist && npm publish && cd ../

author: Paper.xyz <team@paper.xyz>
